overview:
Elliott Draper has over five years experience in commercial web development, having dealt primarily with large scale customer facing sites. He has previously worked with Microsoft .Net and C#, and now focuses on Ruby and Ruby on Rails.

He’s currently running his own freelance web development business, ejdraper.com, providing Ruby on Rails development.

He’s also a developer for BeerMenus.com, a way to browse and search beer menus in New York City, and now Philadelphia and Milwaukee.

Before that, he worked as Senior Developer for TouchLocal, a local business directory listing website in the UK.

He’s worked on a multitude of projects, listed on the portfolio on his site.

He’s a self-proclaimed gamer, blogger, and music fanatic.

Elliott currently resides in the UK.
